mapper.select: select ull.* from t_iam_user_login_log ull WHERE ull.user_id = #{userId} AND ull.auth_action in ('LOGIN', 'REFRESH_TOKEN') AND ull.auth_result = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY ull.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
select ull.* from t_iam_user_login_log ull WHERE ull.access_token_id = #{accessTokenId} AND ull.auth_action in ('LOGIN','REFRESH_TOKEN') AND ull.auth_result = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY ull.create_time DESC

select id, access_token_id, refresh_token_id, access_token_expire, refresh_token_expire, access_token, refresh_token from t_iam_user_login_log ull
ull.user_id IN
#{item}
AND (ull.access_token_expire > #{inputDto.currentTimeMillis} OR ull.refresh_token_expire > #{inputDto.currentTimeMillis} )
